mapper.insert: insert into s_answer (create_time, answer_content, answer_user_id, target_post_id, nick_name, comment_id, target_answer_id, target_user_id, target_nick_name) values (#{time}, #{answerContent}, #{answerUserId}, #{postId}, #{nickName}, #{commentId}, #{targetAnswerId}, #{targetUserId}, #{targetNickName})
mapper.select: select * from s_answer where del_flag = 0 and ((#{a} = 2 and target_user_id = #{id} and (target_answer_id is null or target_answer_id = 0)) or (#{a} = 1 and target_user_id = #{id}) and target_answer_id is not null and target_answer_id != 0) order by create_time desc
select post_title, nick_name, id from s_post where id = #{postId} and del_flag = 0
select nick_name, id, avatar from s_user_info where id = #{userId} and del_flag = 0
select * from s_comment where id = #{commentId} and del_flag = 0
select nick_name, answer_content, answer_user_id from s_answer where id = #{answerId} and del_flag = 0
